source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! reducing the cooldown of Combustion by 2 sec. Casting Combustion always hits a Jackpot! at 200% increased effectiveness.
Set: When you hit a Jackpot! your damage is increased by 15% for 7 sec. If you would gain Jackpot! from Combustion the duration is increased by 100%.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Use: Reduce the remaining cooldown of your 3 most recently cast spells by 5 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Cuffs of the Thousandfold Hells

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,244 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 623 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 112,577 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
Use: Zap yourself for 336,524 Nature damage, gaining 19,664 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
